content: alex s blanket by auroraknits blankets materials 4mm uk 8/ us 6 needles 3 75 mm uk 9 us 5 needles optional approx 500m of dk yarn needle for sewing in ends size blanket is approx 60cm by 72cm 23 6 by 28 3 inches gauge 22st and 26 row to 10cm before blocking after blocking 20 st and 1 pattern repeat to 15cm however exact gauge is not critical although will affect final dimensions try to make sure gauge across patterns is similar using a yarn with some wool with help with this when blocked abbreviations at end instructions with 3 75mm needles cast on 120 st duck egg if your gauge is similar in st-st to garter st then 4mm needles can be used to cast on edging r1 slwyib k to end row 2-10 repeat r1 carry on to section a copyright auroraknits blankets section a this is a st-st section between pattern sections 6 row switch to 4mm needles if used 3 75mm needles for cast on r11 slwyib k to end r12 s1wyib k4 p to last 5 st k5 r13 repeat r11 r14 repeat r12 r15 repeat r11 r16 repeat r12 carry on to section b section b * this is a moss stitch pattern section 4 row r17 slwyib k4 k1 p1 repeat to last 5 st k5 r18 slwyib k4 p1 k1 repeat to last 5 st k5 r19 slwyib k4 k1 p1 repeat to last 5 st k5 r20 slwyib k4 p1 k1 repeat to last 5 st k5 r 21-26 repeat the 6 row of section a carry onto section c section c this is a garter stitch section 6 row r27 slwyib k to end r28 repeat r27 copyright auroraknits blankets r29 repeat row r27 r30 s1wyib k4 p to last 5 st k5 r31 repeat r27 r32 repeat r27 r 33-38 repeat the 6 row of section a carry onto section d section d this is a garter and lace section 4 row r39 slwyib k to end r40 slwyib k to end r41 slwyib k6 yo k2tog k2 repeat to last 5 st k5 r42 slwyib k to end r 43-48 repeat the 6 row of section a r49-54 repeat the 6 row of section c garter stitch section r55-60 repeat the 6 row of section a ** repeat whole pattern from * to ** beginning of section b to r60 3 more times times repeat the 4 row of section b repeat the 6 row of section a repeat the 10 row of the edging use 3 75mm needles for edging if required cast off all stitches block to measurements weave in ends copyright auroraknits blankets abbreviations k knit p purl r row s1wyib slip one stitch with yarn in back yo yarn over k2tog knit 2 stitches together st stitches copyright auroraknits blankets
